actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1460.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 1280) to provide assistance to States and to political subdivisions within States to promote national energy objectives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 1280 (State and local energy assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 1280) to provide assistance to States and to political subdivisions within States to promote national energy objectives, and for other purposes.
